title: MdmServer
description: The data structure that represents a device management service resource in an organization.

id.description: The opaque resource ID that uniquely identifies the resource.

relationships.description: Navigational links to related data and included resource types and IDs.

MdmServer.Attributes.title: MdmServer.Attributes
MdmServer.Attributes.description: Attributes that describe a device management service resource.

createdDateTime.description: The date and time of the creation of the resource.

serverType.description: The type of device management service: MDM, APPLE_CONFIGURATOR, APPLE_MDM

updatedDateTime.description: The date and time of the most-recent update for the resource.

MdmServer.Relationships.title: MdmServer.Relationships
MdmServer.Relationships.description: The relationships you include in the request, and those that you can operate on.

devices.description: The devices in the device management service.

MdmServer.Relationships.Devices.title: MdmServer.Relationships.Devices
MdmServer.Relationships.Devices.description: The data and links that describe the relationship between the resources.

MdmServer.Relationships.Devices.Data.title: MdmServer.Relationships.Devices.Data
MdmServer.Relationships.Devices.Data.description: The type and ID of a related resource.

id.description: The opaque resource ID that uniquely identifies the resource.
